name: Castle Rush (Johan Plasencia)
description:
Blau our main character goes in adventure searching for gold and treasures, he finds a map pointing to a mischievous castle, when he arrived near the castle Blau heard a scream, it was a damsel yelling for help. Blau thinks he will get rewarded with gold if he saves the damsel in danger, but he went so carelessly to the castle that he got captured by the castle habitants. Now you control blau and have to escape from this mysterious castle, that has the mechanism to move rooms to avoid foreigners to exit without help.

Made with Unity, Fl Studio and Photoshop.

Blau can collect coins to buy power ups or use it as projectile weapon.
